Includes sights for the Rooikat Mk.1D+MTTD+105, Ratel 20 (2 sights) and Olifant Mk.2

Oyama Mahiro（緒山真寻）T55AM1 simplified sight.
緒山真寻 T55AM1 简化瞄具。

also avilibile if you put the file in sight folder of any ground vehical.
把文件放进任何地面载具的瞄具文件夹里都可用。

#anime #T55AM1

#leopard2k #radpanzer_90

Germ - Leopard2K / Radpanzer90 Sight
Zoom:8.0x-15.9x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_leopard_2k

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_leopard_2k
Titanfall Tone 40mm crosshair

So someone asked for the Toldi 2's sight so here it is

A semihistorical sight for the Toldi 2

Again the only image I could find was a sketch (pic 2) for the Turán 1's sight which had the same 40mm gun as the Toldi 2 have

A little explanation:
The first distance indicator (the one on the left) is for the AP and APHE
The second one (the one next to the first) is for the HE (I know the ballistics are the same for all rounds, but there are no rounds for the Toldi that have a lower velocity)
The third one (the right one) is for the machine gun

#toldi_2 #hungary #semihistorical

A simple Universal Sight. (Last Edit: 2024/03/14)

Patterns:
A: The simplest one.
B: An addition to A with a memory to calculate distance from the size of the tank (just an approximation).
C: An addition to B with a ring-shaped decoration that zeros in.
D: An addition to C with a formula to calculate distance from the mill, written in the top left corner.
(Note: The author is not familiar with formulas, so they are referring to this while working.)

Color:
Normal: Black
Light: Yellow

Two patterns enclosed for FHD and UWQHD resolutions since the rangefinder's p...

#leopard2

Germ - Leopard2 A4/ A5 /A6 /PSO........Sight
Zoom:4.0x-12.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_leopard_2a6

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_leopard_2a6

A semihistorical sight for the Turán 2 based on the Turán 1's sight

Again the only image I could find was a sketch (pic 2) for the Turán 1's sight which had a 40mm gun, but I've decided to base the sight of from this

A little explanation:
The first distance indicator (the one on the left) is for the AP
The second one (the one next to the first) is for both the HE and HEAT
The third one (the right one) is for the machine gun

#turan_2 #hungary #semihistorical
Just a sight to the delat torn. It's not historical, it's just... random.

Sight for the US ADATS SPAA/Tank Destroyer.
The information shows the range and name of the missile, and also the information of cannon and ammo.
#adats_bradley #adats

A somewhat historical sight for the Zrínyi 1

The only image I could find was a sketch (pic 2) and it is the Turán 3's scope, but the gun is basically the same on both vehicles

Little explanation:
The first distance indicator (the one on the left) is for the AP round
The second one (the right one) is for both the HE and HEAT

(ps.: its my first custom sight so if something doesn't work then sorry)

#zrinyi_1 #hungary #semihistorical

Zrinyi Gun Sight (With Rocket Sight)

The Rocket Sight is not Exactly Perfectly Accurate, but it is kinda Decent-ish

(Also remember to at least Dogeza facing the Enemy for it to work cause it's depression sucks, beside this rocket is basically useless unless your facing open tank or super less armored)

Система управления огнём «Stridsvagn»
Прицельная сетка, основанная на интерфейсе шведских ПТ в World of Tanks.
Рекомендуется использовать на танках с лазерным дальномером.

Особенности:

  • Подписи к рискам поправки дальности перемещены на центральную шкалу.
  • Риски до 6 км каждые 500 метров.
  • Индикатор значения введённой поправки отключён.

Использование:

  1. Навести прицел на цель и измерить дистанцию дальномером;
  2. Дождаться окончания измерения и установки подъёма орудия;
  3. Выстрелить.</...
Универсальный кольцевой прицел для зенитных установок наземной техники.
all tanks

Basically a tank sight with chibidoki on it.

The original picture is cropped so most of the top of chibi's head is missing, so I made a version of the sight that I extended using some big brain art techniques that I don't fell like explaining, I still included the non-extended version though.

#chibidoki #chibi #anime

(Non-historical) Modernized Concept 3 sights/fire control system.
Default lighting is green while alternative lighting is black.

#concept3 #concept_3 #south_africa #southafrica #southafrican

changed version of my original sight.
- main change is that it's ice color(?) (also a preference thing and can be change to whatever you like easily)
- increased the mildot size
- removed the big circle

it is a universal sight.

#capoo

Simple sight for the Type 75 MLRS

I tend to often play the Type 75 MLRS in AB and I made for myself that simple little sight, clear and easy to read
I often zero it to 400m (like on the second picture) so it looks neat and is more usable in general in my opinion

#sight #type75 #type75_mlrs #type_75 #type_75mlrs #mlrs
